DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To investigate effect fish oil patient chronic nonspecific low back pain . Material Methods Subjects : 52 participant recruit outpatient department physical medicine rehabilitation department poster . Duration : 2016.04.21-2017.03.31 Methods : The participant randomly divide experimental group control group draw , 26 patient group . Participants experimental group receive fish oil plus physical modality treatment . Participants control group receive placebo plus physical modality treatment . Assessment : Before therapy start , patient match inclusion criterion evaluate use tool mention : General data : age , sex , body height , body weight , occupation , exercise habit Rate current , best bad pain intensity low back pain previous week 100mm Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) Measure pressure pain threshold pressure algometer Measure lumbar spine range motion flexion extension tape measure Assess endurance back extensor muscle Biering-Sorenson test Classify pain origin ( nociceptive neuropathic ) Chinese version identification pain ( ID pain ) questionnaire Assess impact low back pain daily life Chinese version The Roland Morris Low Back Pain Disability Questionnaire ( RMQ ) Assess impact low back pain work performance fatigue Chinese version The Health Work Performance Questionnaire ( HPQ ) Occupational Burnout Inventory Assess impact low back pain sleep quality Chinese version Athens Insomnia Scale Draw 10ml blood blood test ( ESR hs-CRP ) Participants follow 4 week 8 week therapy start re-assessed pain intensity , pressure pain threshold , lumbar spine range motion , back extensor muscle endurance , impact low back pain daily life , work , sleep quality . Blood test commit therapy course finish .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Fish Oil Patients With Chronic Nonspecific Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Low back pain common symptom modern society . However , nearly 85 % seek medical care low back pain specific history specific find image study , therefore receive specific diagnosis . This type low back pain term `` nonspecific low back pain . '' Fish oil contain omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acid , include eicosapentaenoic acid ( EPA ) docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA ) . EPA DHA reduce synthesis prostaglandin E2 . They also precursors E-resolvin D-resolvin suppress inflammatory cytokine production act resolve inflammation . Several previous study show fish oil effect anti-inflammation pain reduction without side effect affect stomach renal function . Therefore , fish oil consider new type NSAID , many study investigate effect anti-inflammation pain reduction different disease . The purpose study investigate effect fish oil patient chronic nonspecific low back pain .
DOC.criteria: Male female age 2050 Low back pain duration 3 month pain intensity 40mm assess 100mm VAS History major trauma surgery back Obvious spinal pathology plain film ( e.g . scoliosis , spondylosis , spondylolisthesis ) Not suitable take fish oil receive physical modality treatment Having inflammatory disease ( e.g . rheumatic arthritis , endometriosis , ankylose spondylitis , infection ) Pregnancy Regularly take fish oil fatty fish 2 time per week Having coagulopathy currently take anticoagulation agent Receiving oral topical NSAID past one week Taking oral corticosteroid past 6 week Receiving local injection corticosteroid prolotherapy past 3 month
